name.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: One Frame Link Video Frame Grabber

short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Allows programmatic access to frames from video elements (including those loaded in iframes).

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Allows programmatic access to frames from video elements (including those loaded in iframes).

Specifically aids in transcription duties for One Frame Link.
